General.Name: Hubei Kailong Chemical Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Hubei Kailong Chemical Group Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of explosive materials primarily in China. It offers ammonium nitrate and nitro compound fertilizers. It also engages in the production, transportation, and sales of paper-plastic packaging products, fine chemicals, agricultural fertilizers, chemical building materials, and chemical machinery manufacturing; and offers installation services. The company engages in the business of mining products, engineering blasting service, and modern logistics sector. Hubei Kailong Chemical Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1967 and is based in Jingmen, China.

5.Name: Mr. Jie  Sun
5.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors and Director
